title: Tommy Finn
text:
Thomas Finn (born - 21 May 2021) was a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1950s and 1960s. He played at club level for <a href="St%20Helens%20R.F.C.">St Helens R.F.C.</a>, <a href="Hull%20F.C.">Hull FC</a>, as a , i.e. number 7.
Playing career.
Hull FC.
Tommy Finn made his debut for Hull FC in December 1954
Challenge Cup Final appearances.
He played , and scored a <a href="Try%20%28rugby%29">try</a> in <a href="Hull%20F.C.">Hull FC</a>'s 13-30 defeat by <a href="Wigan%20Warriors">Wigan</a> in the <a href="1958%E2%80%9359%20Challenge%20Cup">1958–59</a> <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1958%E2%80%9359%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season%23Challenge%20Cup">1958–59 season</a> at <a href="Wembley%20Stadium%20%281923%29">Wembley Stadium</a>, <a href="London">London</a> on Saturday 9 May 1959, in front of a crowd of 79,811, and played in the 5-38 defeat by <a href="Wakefield%20Trinity">Wakefield Trinity</a> in the <a href="1959%E2%80%9360%20Challenge%20Cup">1959–60</a> <a href="Challenge%20Cup">Challenge Cup</a> Final during the <a href="1959%E2%80%9360%20Northern%20Rugby%20Football%20League%20season%23Challenge%20Cup">1959–60 season</a> at <a href="Wembley%20Stadium%20%281923%29">Wembley Stadium</a>, <a href="London">London</a> on Saturday 14 May 1960, in front of a crowd of 79,773.
